thread.title: Orthopedic surgeon pay varies with experience: 4 statistics
thread.title_full: Orthopedic surgeon pay varies with experience: 4 statistics

author: avaidya@beckershealthcare.com (Anuja Vaidya)
title: Orthopedic surgeon pay varies with experience: 4 statistics
text:
Orthopedic surgeon pay varies with experience: 4 statistics Featured Written by Anuja Vaidya | Wednesday, 30   
On average, orthopedic physicians earn $342,000 in the United States; however, this figure varies with experience level, according to Payscale.com . 
Here are four statistics on orthopedic surgeon salary in accordance with experience level: (Numbers are approximations) 
• Entry level (0 to 5 years) — $307,000• Mid-career (5 to 10 years) — $347,000• Experienced (10 to 20 years) — $387,000• Late-career (more than 20 years) — $403,000
